reviews.review: It was excellent. Never expected the killer to be who they were.

The movie was outstanding. The plot was opened up from the beginning with the twist and turns at the perfect time of the movie. The actors worked very well with each other.
Can't wait to see it agani
A fun romp, a tongue in cheek take on murder mysteries and dysfunctional family comedies- INCREDIBLE casting and fun plot twists- go see this movie!!!
Great cast and super fun plot!

Fast moving light hearted suspense...Like the game of Clue!!!
Loved it.
Great actors, lots of twists and turns.

Rating: A

"In the end, Rian Johnson is able to bounce back from the divisive The Last Jedi with one of the best whodunnits I've ever seen, Knives Out. Rian proves that not only he's a talented filmmaker but also a phenomenal screenwriter. With a renowned and impressive ensemble cast, Daniel Craig and Ana de Armas are standouts within all of the other outstanding performances, Chris Evans being right behind. With one of the best screenplays of the year, the mystery at its center keeps everyone extremely captivated until the very end, even if you guess "who did it" beforehand. Masterfully written dialogue, remarkable editing, and great use of classic cinematography techniques. It's an entertaining story with tremendous replay value and significant political/social layers that only elevate the already complex yet subtle narrative. Don't miss it!"

I wasn't expecting much going in, but I was pleasantly surprised. A genuinely engaging thriller that manages to maintain a lighthearted and comedic tone while tackling deeper social issues right below the surface. Excellent performances by the cast and really interesting plot twists and turns! Must see.

There were 4 of us who saw it together and we all thought it was bad. Dont get me wrong, we enjoy a good mystery/who done it but this was just boring. And none of us were buying Daniel Craigs southern accent.... it was just distracting. It appears we are in the minority here as most other people Ive spoken with seem to love it.
Great movie! Good twist that keeps you on your toes. Funny humor!
